name: 8BPlus Hanna Chalk Bag - Unisex
description: Climbing is fun. Your chalkbag should be, too. When it's time to step up the fun factor, this handmade and ready-to-go chalk bag brings oodles of character and silliness to even the burliest projects.Polyester fleece main fabric with soft pile lining.Adjustable waistbelt with clip closure.Two holders house your precious boar's hair brushes.Stiff rim with 12.5cm access makes for easy chalking.
